contents.name: txCount
contents.long_comment:
This is a long comment. Long comment is long. 
 This is a new line.

contents.name: rxSignalDuration
contents.inline_comment: The duration the received signals in seconds

contents.name: txCount
contents.inline_comment: How many radar transmit units there are

contents.name: rxCount
contents.inline_comment: How many radar receiver units there are

contents.name: txFireEventCount
contents.inline_comment: The total number of times that the transmitters fired

contents.name: rxReceiveEventCount
contents.inline_comment: The total number of times that the receivers took data

contents.name: numberOfFrames
contents.inline_comment: The number of frames in this radar data structure

contents.name: txIds
contents.inline_comment: The IDs of the tx unit for each element in the txFireTimesInSeconds array

contents.name: txFrameLengths
contents.inline_comment: The length of each frame. Note that sum(txFrameLengths) = txFireEventCount

contents.name: txFireTimesInSeconds
contents.inline_comment: The point in time that each transmitter fired

contents.name: rxIds
contents.inline_comment: The IDs of the rx unit for each element in the rxReceiveEventCount array

contents.name: rxFrameLengths
contents.inline_comment: The length of each frame. Note that sum(rxFrameLengths) = rxReceiveEventCount

contents.name: rxFireTimesInSeconds
contents.inline_comment: The point in time that each receiver started taking data
